Name: Closed source
Description:
You can play your cards hidden.

Just before the game ends, you may hide this to activate any number of cards.

Name: Open source
Description: This card cannot be hidden (both sides show the description) ; ALL future crates get +2

Name: Transmute
Description: Move a technique to the crates category.

Name: Clone
Description: Play on top of another technique, double its points.

Name: Observer
Description: Gets +1 point at the start of each of your turns.

Name: Relation
Description: Sets an allied card to 8pt.

Name: Test
Description: Discard 2 crates

Name: Bug
Description: Each player with an empty discard pile discards a random visible crate.

Name: Bugfix
Description: Put the top card from your discard pile in the 2nd position of your draw pile.

Name: Issue triage
Description: Passive: Has -1 points for each card in your discard pile (can be negative).

Name: New maintainer
Description: Move your discard pile on top of another player's discard pile.

Name: Sprint
Description: Draw 5 cards, discard all non technique cards drawn.

Name: Jam
Description: Draw 3 cards, discard all technique cards drawn.

Name: Socialize
Description: Guess a personal interest of each player; if you guess all incorrectly, discard this card.
Flavor: Keep this card and start getting info ;)

Name: HR
Description: If 3 members are played consecutively, discard this.

Name: Maintainer
Description: If 3 crates are played consecutively, discard this.

Name: Networking
Description: If you have at least 3 members, play an additional card.

Name: Obfuscate
Description: Hide a non member allied card.

Name: Spam
Description: Hide 2 opponent cards.

Name: Copyright
Description: Opponents cannot modify your cards.

Name: Opportunity
Description: Put top card of an opponent discard pile on the top of your draw card.

Name: Secret
Description: Play hidden, this card only counts towards final points if it's hidden.

Name: Spy
Description:
Look at an opponent’s hidden cards.

You can choose to activate a card for them (which can’t fail).

Name: Pre-release
Description: When your next turn starts: From now on, no one can play crates.

Name: .iter()
Description: Every player draws a card

Name: .rev()
Description: Reverse the play order

Name: dbg!
Description: Choose a category, look at a card from a player's hand, if the category matches, steal the card.

Name: info!
Description: Choose a category, look at a card from your draw pile, if the category matches, play it, otherwise, keep it in your hand.

Name: panic!
Description: Discard all your crate cards, then draw as many cards and play them.
